--- title: "Flowchart fiend? Let Quarto's mermaid integration cast its spell" date: '2022-08-28' categories: ['R', 'Quarto', 'Mermaid'] execute: message: false warning: false editor_options: chunk_output_type: console draft: true --- For anybody who makes tons of flowcharts, `mermaid` may be siren song that draws you to Quarto ```{mermaid} flowchart LR A((Can I
have pizza?)) A --> B{What time
of day is it?} B --> C(Morning) B --> D(Evening) B --> E(Supper Time) C --> F{Is said pizza
on a bagel?} D --> F E --> F F -->|Yes| G[YOU CAN EAT
PIZZA
ANYTIME!] F -->|NO| H[NO PIZZA
FOR YOU!] ```
